member.name: T:DailyChores.Data.Models.Chore
member.summary:
The DailyChores.Data.Models.Chore class. Creates a new model for the dataset. In this case, it in named Chore.
Constructor Initialises Chore and sets the CreatedOn on the current datetime.
Id Ids are unique for each Chore
Name Each chore should have a name.
Description Gives more information about the Chore
CreatedOn stores when the Chore was created.

remarks.para: This chore model stores the basic information about each Chore, that the app is working with.

member.name: M:DailyChores.Data.Models.Chore.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises a chore and the datetime when it was created.
member.returns: Does not return anything in this case.

member.name: P:DailyChores.Data.Models.Chore.Id
member.summary: Each Chore must have different Id. By default, it auto increments.

member.name: P:DailyChores.Data.Models.Chore.Name
member.summary: Each Chore must have a Name.

member.name: P:DailyChores.Data.Models.Chore.Description
member.summary: Each Chore must have a small description.

member.name: P:DailyChores.Data.Models.Chore.CreatedOn
member.summary: This is teh datetime, when the Chore was created.
